question: Has commuting early become less of a problem? Have you ___ commute early?
Maggie is a nurse. She is used to ___ at night.
Her boyfriend is from Australia, so he isn’t used to ___ on the right side of a street.
Tom wasn’t so friendly in the past. He ___ be so friendly
The students were not used to ___ over an hour on their homework.
Her new working schedule is very demanding. She ___ it.
Noah has gotten used to ___ his dog out for a walk twice a day.
Did you ___ play basketball in high school?
It’s taking her a long time to be used to ___ in a humid country.
When I was a child, I used to ___ my sister’s clothes.
I ___ drinking a glass of warm milk before going to bed.
Ella lived with her parents for a long time, but now she has her own apartment. She ___ live with her parents in the past.
They couldn’t recognize Ted because he didn’t use to ___ beard.
We keep making mistakes on the new computer system. We need to ___ it as soon as possible.
My uncle has moved to Madrid for six months and he still can’t get used to ___ lunch and dinner late .
I don’t usually have dinner early. I ___ having dinner early.
